desc: AV Now is the Sound of Fitness offering Group Exercise, Portable, Boutique, Mind Body-Yoga, SGT Sound Systems, Sweat-proof Wireless Microphones, Aqua-Aerobic Sound Systems, Background Music and Effects Lighting. All products are Fitness-Rated to withstand the demands of the rugged group exercise fitness environment.
